com.teamten.image
Class DecomposableConvolveOp

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.image.AbstractBufferedImageOp
      com.teamten.image.DecomposableConvolveOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
BufferedImageOp
public class DecomposableConvolveOp
extends AbstractBufferedImageOp

Like ConvolveOp, this convolves a kernel with an image. But this class assumes that the filter is linearly decomposable, and performs the operation in two passes.

Constructor Summary
DecomposableConvolveOp(double[] kernel)
          The kernel is the horizontal or vertical cross-section of the 2D kernel through its center.
 
Method Summary
 BufferedImage filter(BufferedImage src, BufferedImage dest)
           
static double[] makeGaussianKernel(double radius)
          Returns a Gaussian kernel of the specified radius, where the radius represents one sigma (standard deviation).
 
Methods inherited from class com.teamten.image.AbstractBufferedImageOp
createCompatibleDestImage, getBounds2D, getPoint2D, getRenderingHints
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

DecomposableConvolveOp

public DecomposableConvolveOp(double[] kernel)
The kernel is the horizontal or vertical cross-section of the 2D kernel through its center. The kernel should have an odd length.

Method Detail

filter

public BufferedImage filter(BufferedImage src,
                            BufferedImage dest)

makeGaussianKernel

public static double[] makeGaussianKernel(double radius)
Returns a Gaussian kernel of the specified radius, where the radius represents one sigma (standard deviation).
